html:
{% set terms_exist = doc.terms and (doc.terms|striptags).strip() or "" %} {% if letter_head and not no_letterhead -%}
{{ letter_head }}
{%- endif %}

Date: {{ doc.offer_date }}

Dear {{ doc.applicant_name }},

We are pleased to appoint you in the services of {{ doc.company }} on the terms and conditions detailed in this letter.

Your designation shall be {{ doc.designation }}.

{%- if doc.offer_terms -%} {%- for row in doc.offer_terms -%} {{ row.offer_term }}: {{ row.value }}
{%- endfor -%} {%- endif -%}
Please read the detailed terms as below. If you have any queries, feel free to get in touch with us. We look forward to your long and fruitful career association with our organisation. If you decide to join us, 'Welcome to {{ doc.company }} !'

Yours truly,



Authorized Signatory
{{ doc.company }}

{% if terms_exist %}
{{ doc.terms }}
{% endif %}

html:
{% if letter_head %} {{ letter_head }} {% endif %}

{{ doc.company }}
{% if doc.company_address_display %} {% set company_address = doc.company_address_display.replace("\n", " ").replace("
", " ") %} {% if "GSTIN" not in company_address %} {{ company_address }} {{ _("GSTIN") }}:{{ doc.company_gstin }} {% else %} {{ company_address.replace("GSTIN", "
GSTIN") }} {% endif %} {% endif %}
{% if doc.docstatus == 0 %} {{ doc.status + " "+ (doc.select_print_heading or _("Invoice")) }}
{% else %} {{ doc.select_print_heading or _("Invoice") }}
{% endif %}

{{ _("Receipt No") }}: {{ doc.name }}
{{ _("Cashier") }}: {{ doc.owner }}
{{ _("Date") }}: {{ doc.get_formatted("posting_date") }}
{{ _("Time") }}: {{ doc.get_formatted("posting_time") }}
{% if doc.grand_total > 50000 %} {% set customer_address = doc.address_display.replace("\n", " ").replace("
", " ") %} {{ _("Customer") }}:
{{ doc.customer_name }}
{{ customer_address }} {% endif %}

{%- for item in doc.items -%} {%- endfor -%}
{{ _("Item") }} {{ _("Qty") }} {{ _("Amount") }}
{{ item.item_code }} {%- if item.item_name != item.item_code -%}
{{ item.item_name }} {%- endif -%} {%- if item.gst_hsn_code -%}
{{ _("HSN/SAC") }}: {{ item.gst_hsn_code }} {%- endif -%} {%- if item.serial_no -%}
{{ _("SR.No") }}:
{{ item.serial_no | replace("\n", ", ") }} {%- endif -%} 		{{ item.qty }}
@ {{ item.rate }}		 {{ item.get_formatted("amount") }}
{% if doc.flags.show_inclusive_tax_in_print %} {% else %} {% endif %} {%- for row in doc.taxes -%} {%- if (not row.included_in_print_rate or doc.flags.show_inclusive_tax_in_print) and row.tax_amount != 0 -%} {%- endif -%} {%- endfor -%} {%- if doc.discount_amount -%} {%- endif -%} {%- if doc.rounded_total -%} {%- endif -%} {%- for row in doc.payments -%} {%- endfor -%} {%- if doc.change_amount -%} {%- endif -%}
{{ _("Total Excl. Tax") }} {{ doc.get_formatted("net_total", doc) }} {{ _("Total") }} {{ doc.get_formatted("total", doc) }}
{% if '%' in row.description %} {{ row.description }} {% else %} {{ row.description }}@{{ row.rate }}% {% endif %} {{ row.get_formatted("tax_amount", doc) }}
{{ _("Discount") }} {{ doc.get_formatted("discount_amount") }}
{{ _("Grand Total") }} {{ doc.get_formatted("grand_total") }}
{{ _("Rounded Total") }} {{ doc.get_formatted("rounded_total") }}
{{ row.mode_of_payment }} {{ row.get_formatted("amount", doc) }}
{{ _("Paid Amount") }} {{ doc.get_formatted("paid_amount") }}
{{ _("Change Amount") }} {{ doc.get_formatted("change_amount") }}

{{ doc.terms or "" }}

{{ _("Thank you, please visit again.") }}

TERMS & CONDITIONS
Warranty Coverage:
  • The Manufacturer guarantees that the Product shall be free from defects in materials and workmanship under normal use and maintenance during the Warranty Period.
  • The warranty will last for a period of one year from the date of invoice for all items except the battery and printer. The battery and printer carry a 6-month warranty. Consumables do not contain any warranty.
  • The freight incurred for the dispatch of the defective material to and from will have to be borne by the purchaser, and the transit risk for such material will rest with the purchaser.
  • The Manufacturer shall, at its discretion, repair or replace any part of the Product that proves to be defective in materials or workmanship under normal use and maintenance during the Warranty Period, without charge.
Warranty Limitations:
This warranty does not cover damage caused by:
  • Accident, fire, theft, over-voltage in the charging source, and natural calamities like flood, lightning, earthquake, etc. It is recommended to take other precautions like insurance coverage against these incidents.
  • The warranty covers only rectification of the defect or replacement of the defective part. It does not cover any data loss.
  • The replacement warranty is applicable only for the first 1 month from the date of invoice.
  • The part or parts used to replace the defective part may or may not be brand new ones. However, SOFTLAND INDIA LTD assures that they will be in good working conditions as new.
  • Any modification or alteration of the Product without prior authorization from the Manufacturer.
  • This warranty is non-transferable and applies only to the original purchaser of the Product.
Claim Procedure:
  • To make a warranty claim, the original purchaser must provide proof of purchase (receipt or invoice) and contact the Manufacturer or its authorized dealer.
  • The Manufacturer reserves the right to inspect the Product to determine the nature and cause of the defect.
Disclaimer:
  • The Manufacturer shall not be liable for any incidental, consequential, or indirect damages arising out of the use or inability to use the Product.
